description:
The new Pekoponian invasion plan calls for mass distribution of Kululu-created bubble gum that causes various annoying effects like weightlessness and the compulsion to litter (and then step on it). Later on, after the platoon gathers mushrooms, a witch hunt ensues to find the Keronian who ate a poisonous mushroom that will turn him into a contagious Mushroom Man.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Chewing Gum? / Tamama, Tamama Tango
ケロロ ガム噛む? / タママ タママタンゴ
